feed.title: Trevon’s research lab
feed.subtitle: Nanophotonics and metamaterials research at Korea University Sejong Campus

entry.title: We went to the horseshoe canyon!~

link.title: We went to the horseshoe canyon!~

entry.content:
We went to the horseshoe canyon!~

We went to SPIE Optics and Photonics 2022 and got SPIE Education Scholarships and enjoyed a trip around California, including the grand canyon, and the horseshoe.

/images/news/2023/USA.jpeg

We went to the horseshoe canyon!~

<a href=”/trevons-lab-website/edited-post/” class=”post-excerpt-image” aria-label=”We went to the horseshoe canyon!~”

<img src=”/trevons-lab-website/images/news/2023/USA.jpeg” alt=”We went to the horseshoe canyon!~” loading=”lazy” onerror=”this.src = ‘/trevons-lab-website/images/fallback.svg’; this.onerror = null;”

</a>

We had an amazing trip to Horseshoe Canyon! The view was breathtaking, and we managed to capture some fantastic photos.
entry.summary: We went to the horseshoe canyon!~
